overview: Raging Stallion/Falcon, the world's biggest gay porn studio, launches its first new DVD Line since they merged. The new line, under the direction of Andrew Rosen, is called Guys Like Us and it launches with Just For You, its first DVD, focusing on young men having great sex.
tagline: Five scorching lessons on what Guys Like Us do best:  fuck   Just For You
title: Just For You
